name: Barry Lewis
text:
I know that places like Walmart Stores have been here for many years. I am an old hippie and old school school . Just personally the mom and pop have faded into history....I don't think I am the only human that has noticed the extinction of days gone by"Mom&Pop"stores. Most people don't like change...I know to survive in the era of technology the human equation has to change or get left out and sadly we have to adapt to a different environment. Don't take my bicentennial moments of rambling that seriously . I will say that my experience at Walmart today was very good.  More particular is that my squirrels and varieties of birds are really happy! Once again share stories and dine on songbird seeds that I purchased can not be found locally except Walmart or Amazon online.
Tonight's movie is a classic titled [Don't Bend Over In The Pea Patch cause Them Taters have Eyes]"FILM AT 11:00PM

name: Phillip Hale
text:
Terrible store. You’ve got order pickup spots taken up by people who aren’t picking online orders up, people rolling carts in random directions(literally hitting other peoples cars), trash all across the parking lot. Cops parked outside but not enforcing road laws. Sitting in 95+ degree heat waiting for people to do their job and bring bags to the car. People want 15/hr. But can’t do the simplest part of their job.

Walmart should go ahead and shut this one down. Not worth the money to upkeep, paying employees to not do their job. Trash.

name: tonya moseley
text: They are so kind. Very knowledgeable. Great products! Healthy plants. Highly recommend!!

name: Brenda Beech
text: I love shopping and buying my plants from Williams Nursery. Mr Eddie and Mrs Margaret are always so helpful and kind and help me make good selections. The plants are always healthy and the prices are very reasonable. Plan to get some azaleas soon for our extended yard. You can never go wrong getting your plants here.

name: Lynn Harrell
text: Williams Nursery has a great selection to choose from in addition to the education gained about available products.  If there is something I want and it's not available, Kerri Williams will find it for me!! Kerri is easy to contact and readily available to answer any questions I may have about plants, flowers, etc. This is a family friendly business, and I'm always greeted with a smile and have pleasurable experiences while "shopping" even when I bring along my 6 year old who plays on the Williams' Nursery swing set.  This nursery is a must to visit in Leroy, AL. :)

name: Steve Ferrell
text: Great place for your flower needs!!!

name: Tiffany Anderson
text: They are wonderful folks who are knowledgeable in what they do. I have been a customer for 5 years now. Have bought over 25 different trees that came from Williams Nursery and planted throughout my yard. They are quick to respond and customer service is top notch! They also treat you like family and I enjoy my visits there!

name: Gayla Dearman
text: I always enjoy stopping by! The have super friendly service and love their varieties! They’ve never let me down! ❤️ Prices are great as well!

name: Darlene Harper
text: I love buying my plants locally. Kerrie is so helpful as well as Margaret and Eddie.  They always have something you want and such reasonable prices. ❤️

name: Nicole Horton
text: If you have not visited this place you MUST! I love the way it is tucked away and I absolutely adore the fern covered whimsical cottage style A-frame building they have. Wonderful, friendly service! ❤️❤️❤️

name: angel rockwell
text: I have always picked up my front porch plants from Williams Nursery. All I have to do is give them a call if there is something different that I am looking for, they find it! Super sweet and time efficient. Also, can help with advice if your plants are looking a little sickly. Thank you Williams Nursery for all of your years of service to our little community. Love you guys!

name: Debra Tyler
text: I love buying flowers from you. Especially those hard to get ones. Just walking around your nursery and looking at the flowers makes me smile. There nothing like Flowers... God's gift to us gardeners.

name: Lauren Ross
text: You can search anywhere and every where I will not find a better priced, the sweetest service, and help here at Williams Nursery & Landscapes.  My complete yard, camp, and several other yards I have helped landscape has came from here.  This is my happy place!!  You can’t beat it!!

name: Brittany Harrell
text: The friendliest and most helpful place to buy your plants! The plants and flowers are always very healthy and beautiful!!! We used William's Nursery to purchase all of our front yard landscaping and it still looks great 5 years later!!

name: KATHY ETHEREDGE
text: I live in the same area as Williams nursery and I absolutely love going there. They have been a great help to our community, always willing to help with everything from the high school to the local parks .  Thank you so very much!!

name: Corwren Dunnam
text: Wonderful service, and willing to help and answer m questions. I have even been by when the business was closed and they helped me. Love buying my flowers local and supporting local families❤️ Recommend to anyone.

name: Jennifer Stephens
text: Best nursery to get beautiful plants and friendly, personal service.  I have gotten plants for my home, and my work place.  My church has also used them for landscaping needs, and our high school for fundraisers. Highly recommend Williams Nursery!

name: Leslie Jones
text: Kerri knows her stuff!! Never disappointed with any plants I’ve bought from Williams. Excellent service!! 🌺🌸🌼🌷🌹🌱

text: Everytime I visit my hometown Leroy, Ala especially in spring I try to visit William's Nursery and always buy something to bring home. Great prices, great selection, excellent customer service. Always happy to support hometown nursery.

text: I called the garden center and inquired about edible mushroom grow kits (mycodome) and vermiculite, as I am aspiring to become a cultivator of table mushrooms like shiitake, lions main, morel and portibello. I didn't get the info I needed so I'll have to take my business elsewhere.

text: Great service people ready to help me plus they loaded everything into the car for me help me a lot then being there to help me I've had two shoulder surgeries in the lower back they didn't hesitate loaded it right up :-) give him a shot great place to shop good quality service.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Great

name: Adam Hodel
text: This is a great little shop for anyone looking to add some character to their house or yard. I love stopping by and browsing every time I'm nearby. The owners are very kind and reasonable. I had purchased a somewhat expensive piece that I thought my wife would like, but it ended up not working out. They were very reasonable about allowing a return.  I would certainly recommend that people stop by and browse for ideas, and buy something if you find something perfect. I love their selection of stone statues (Gnomes, dragons, birds, etc)

name: Debbie Dean
text: I can't wait for a return trip to Birmingham so that I can come to Charlie thigpen's Garden Gallery again! They have the most amazing varieties of plants that I have never heard of. And inside they have the most beautiful living arrangements of these plants and the coolest things to buy. Massive wind chimes and gorgeous garden lights and everything Garden. And they are such lovely people. It is well worth the trip.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie!  We're so glad that you enjoyed your visit!

name: Alyssa Vickers
text: I enjoyed looking at the products, but felt as if I was being treated differently because I had my toddler with me . It was obvious that I was monitoring what she was doing, but one of the employees decided to tell her (me, indirectly) that what she was touching was hand carved and very expensive after watching us like a hawk in the store. I found several things that I liked, but couldn’t bring myself to support this business because of the way we were treated.

name: Hank Powers
text: A great place with an awesome staff. They were so helpful and kind. We will go back again soon.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!   We appreciate your comments!

name: Cherry Ocar
text: Everything in this place is enchanting and extraordinary. Friendly and engaging staff. It's always lovely here.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Joel Blackstock (LICSW MSW PIP)
text: Great place! They have a beautiful store and courtyard full of unique plants and container gardens.  They also have great quality gardening and wild birding supplies.

name: Dianne Mooney
text: It's the best customer service in town. And the products are so beautiful and well sourced. It's my go-to place for gifts.

resp.text: Thank you Dianne. It's always fun to work with fun people!

name: Frances S
text: Simply amazing. Wonderful customer service, beautiful products, and a superb atmosphere. I can't imagine a nicer place to spend an afternoon with a friend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!   As a small business, our goal is offer an enjoyable experience, so we appreciate your acknowledgement!

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: Brenda Graham
text: Such a beautiful place with so many great plant options. A plant lovers dream

name: Beth Taylor
text: Need to add some green to your life, City-dwellers? Stop by in to Botanica for a plant of your choice. Whether you’re a green thumb or just aspiring to be, you’ll find a little something here, for you!!!

name: Kelsey Sizemore
text: Shopping at Botanica is always fun! The staff is super helpful and knowledge- they have amazing customer service. If you're looking for a wide variety of house plants, check them out!

name: Eze Rojas
text: Excellent service, prices are better and less pomp and fluff than the local L&P competitors. Caitlin gives great advice on plant selection suited to your actual environment. Awesome repurposed location in chic vintage storefront. Parking is a bit of a mess, but it's downtown, so can't expect perfection. Check this place out.

name: Jordan Parkman
text: The vibe in Botanica is unmatched. I could shop here for hours upon hours just looking at their wide selection of plants. The staff are very knowledgeable and are ready to answer any question. The prices are a little more than other plant store, but I can justify it because the quality of the plants are unmatched and I get to support a local business.

name: Alex
text: Amazing customer service. The guy at the front desk was very knowledgeable on every plant we asked him about and very friendly too. There’s also ton of options. I could spend all day in there.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words! We’re glad you had an awesome experience!

name: janneise walker
text: Great employee  very knowledgeable.. I look forward  to future  purchases..

name: Brandi Fuller
text: I absolutely LOVE Botanica! The staff is so knowledgeable and helpful, and will patiently answer any questions I have. They always have such a good variety of plants and the cutest pots. Not to mention the story itself is adorable and so aesthetically pleasing. Definitely a Birmingham must-see!

name: Lynn Gardner
text: Please be sure and go here!!  Stairs inside to the second floor only if you feel like climbing them. Otherwise great stuff on the first floor, very calming environment, helpful staff. Just a fantastic place to go. Street parking, on the weekend with absolutely no problem.

resp.text: Thank you, Lynn! We are so thrilled that you had a great experience shopping with us!

name: Sarah Mellown
text: Customer service is through the roof!! I’ve only ordered online as a gift for a friend, butchered the order and was immediately contacted for clarification. Not only did they go the extra mile to deliver my order that day, they presented it much better than imagined! Can’t wait for the other plants I’ve bought for myself and future orders!

name: Rachel Sandefur
text: BEST PLACE IN  BIRMINGHAM ! Botanica is a joy to visit and one of my favorite local small businesses to support. The plants are beautiful and top notch quality, the staff members are knowledgeable and so helpful! There are often popups that support other small businesses, which I love. It's a great place to browse, shop for beautiful greenery, and has plants for every shade of green-thumb. Caitlin is so obviously passionate about the plants and is willing to find one that works best for each customer's situation. She even goes above and beyond to offer consultations! a great business with great products and even greater service!

name: J Le
text: Pots and plants here are so nicely organized. I always want to buy something when I walk in. But I do notice that the plants I buy here, die way faster than anywhere else.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us! Our staff is always more than happy to help you with plant care tips to keep your plants happy and healthy.

name: S J
text:
First of all, every plant I get from her is 15/10 quality! Whether it’s local delivery or two day shipping, they
arrive in perfect condition. She has such a unique variety of hard-to-find plants, too. She is also SO responsive and so helpful when you have questions/concerns or need tips on how to care for your plant babies. Not to mention, I could sit in her store for hours just because it’s so pleasant. So awesome to see a female running a small business and THRIVING! Especially during a global pandemic. She’s made it so easy to access all your plant needs despite not being able to physically shop right now. Every plant store (and really any store in general) should take notes because she is doing it 110% the right way. Please shop here! You won’t be disappointed.

name: Elizabeth Ogden
text: Incredible! Beautiful and well maintained selection! The staff was knowledgable and helpful!

name: Caroline Rose
text: My favorite plant spot in the area!

name: Katherine Kratina
text: Purchased a plant and planter online. Very fast shipping, the plant arrived in beautiful condition. They accidentally sent the wrong planter size and immediately sent the correct one. Wonderful customer service, will definitely buy my next plant from them!

name: mollie blackwood
text: Botanica is a beautiful space to browse and enjoy. Even better the plants are high quality and you can't go wrong picking any one of them because Caitlin will be sure you know how to care for them before you leave. She is a wealth of knowledge and her store is an asset to downtown Birmingham.

name: Anna Kathryn Bonner
text: A friend recommended this shop to me and it was so worth the drive to go! They didn’t have the plant I wanted but I found two small plants that were even cooler. Awesome personal service and welcoming staff! I cannot wait until I can go again!

name: Caitlin Denard
text: Caitlin knows her stuff when it come to all things plants! She has made me love them and learn how to not kill them! Who knew plants could be so much fun and such an amazing way to decorate? I highly recommend this store and the owner. Great experience all around.

name: Ugarte Aurelia
text: Gorgeous interior, friendly staff, and great selection of plants!

resp.text: Ma'am, no one yelled at your daughter. We only requested that you and your daughter leave the bird's nest undisturbed (I even said "please"), because often a mother bird will not return to a nest which has been disturbed. We respect that we share our outdoor space with the local wildlife, and we just don't want the baby birds to die. We want everyone who visits our store to feel welcome, people and wildlife.

name: The Schusters
text: I am so happy with the level of customer service I received from Monica over the last several weeks! I called to see if there were any yellow Lady Bank roses in stock yet, but they had not arrived for the season. Monica took my name and number, and said she would call back to let me know when they arrived. Most places wouldn’t even call back, but she called me back a few days later to let me know when they would be in...then the next week or so to tell me they arrived, AND that she picked the best one for me, and put my name on it. I feel like she went above and beyond what most would do, and it meant the world to me. I specifically needed a yellow Lady Banks to replace one that we lost in a move, which was given to us in memory of our miscarriage 6 years ago. Now, I have the prettiest blooms, and am reminded of our sweet angel in heaven...and also how sweet Monica was to get me what I requested! I will keep going back there, for sure!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are very fortunate to have her as our Garden Center General Manager! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Rozlynn Bakes
text: I recently moved to the area and was looking for nursery that sold high quality pottery and plants. I thought the Greenery was lovely and had a great selection.  In my short time here in Owens Cross Roads, I have bought 2 wreaths there and several plants.  About 2 weeks ago on a Saturday, I went there and bought 3 house plants and 2 of the Italian made pots, spending $80 in total. I took them home and 2 of the plants have done great but by the following Thursday the third plant had completely shriveled up and died.  It took me another week to get to the greenery to show them my dead plant. When I brought it to the front counter and showed them the plant, they quizzed me on when I watered it and where I put it and then proceeded to tell me it was a very finicky plant 🌱 and I stated my other plants were fine and hadn’t had a plant die in 4 days ever.  I suggested a replacement but they just made me feel like it was my fault it died so tough luck.  They were not rude but also not helpful.  I walked away from the counter shaking my head.  I feel like with so many competitors and options of places to shop that in the end helping me and switching it out would have been no big deal at all.  It was a $14.99 plant.  In the end, I left deciding to not return to that location.  There are plenty other places to buy plants and pottery.

We really enjoyed ourselves and look forward to other classes they may offer in the future.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed the class! We are very fortunate to have Monica as our Garden Center General Manager! Thank so much for your kind words!

name: Pam Davis
text: The Greenery is a beautiful business but I recently had a very disappointing experience with them.   I bought a milkweed from them and it grew very well but never bloomed the whole summer.  I called and talked with them and they gave no solution.  I had hoped they would replace it but they just said "well maybe it will bloom later".  We discussed where I planted it and that was not the issue as it grew tall, just no blooms.  In early fall it died suddenly.  I have always liked the greenery for its quality of plants but I was extremely disappointed in their lack of response to my dilemma and absence of trying to satisfy or help a disappointed customer.

resp.text: We very much regret that our customer service did not meet your expectations and for that reason we would like to provide you with a store credit for the amount that you paid for the plant. Our warranty excludes perennials as they can be a little finicky and are often not as long lived as a tree or shrub. On a positive note - if you haven’t already pulled the milkweed up it may very well put back out in the spring as it is normal for them to go dormant in the fall. If it’s gone and you decide to try another milkweed be sure to plant in full sun where there is good drainage.

name: Isaac Bussey
text:
They started by being understaffed and not being able to get a description of what they have in stock over the phone.
As a landscaper this is a huge detriment, then when I went there to look at stick in person I had to go through 3 people and start over with each one telling them what I wanted and who I was with.
When I finally found a person to help me that is a greenhouse worker we wandered around for a while and they didn’t know where the plant I was looking for was.
Then I find the plant after the greenhouse worker walks past it and doesn’t recognize it.
Then I finally get to the register and they say in order to check out and get a discount for being a landscaper I have to fax in my SLP, which I completely understand, I asked if I could email it after I leave and the employee says yes that’s fine.
I get my SLP and am emailing it and I call them to ask if they can now apply the discount to the order and they say no. They can only apply it to new orders and cannot apply the discount to an old order.

Literally I could take these plants back in there with my receipt and get a refund and then buy them again and I would get the discount.

And no other nursery in the area requires an SLP for the landscapers discount.

Any nursery can sell good plants but it takes a great nursery to have good customer service.

I will literally drive to CatBird Seat in Madison or Indian Creek Nursery on Slaughter road being 25 minutes away before I go here again.

Coming from a landscaper this place was a complete waste of time and the plants at a 20% discount still would have been more expensive then Madison local nurseries.

name: Windy Dobbs
text: I've been to every nursery in NE AL.  Selection, quality, resources and staff are all great.  However, they will not hold up to their 1 year guarantee.  I brought a plant in that had died.  I bought 4 total, 1 didn't make it.  The lady there quickly got on the defensive and stated, we can't take that back in a nasty and rude way.  Then she proceeded to go through a list with me from planting to watering to see if she could find a reason to blame the plant's death on me.  She went with improper watering schedule.  I told her I have an irrigation system.  She asked me how much water it is putting out, I responded, "I don't know the exact output yet, but all the other plants are doing well which is a good indication."  And that was not good enough for her.  So, I just gave up.  It was clearly going to be an issue not worthy of the stress.  BTW:  If you need a tree form ligustrum, Packs Nursery has them for $30 where the Greenery was selling them for $129!!

resp.text: Hi, Windy. I’m very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience when you brought a plant back for replacement under our warranty. We can and will do better than that. Please reach out to us so that we can make it right. You can call me at(256) 518-9836. Thank you, Becky Ray

text: Having been around the construction business for right at 20 years it's always nice to find a building supply that is easy to work with, knowledgeable in every building aspect field- as well as willingness to order/aquire whatever you may need. Marvin's of Arab gets a 5 star rating from me. Go see Kelly, Brandy, Derrick, Karen or Rose, they will definitely help you get situated with whatever project you may have going. Big, small....they will treat you like the neighbor you like living by!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Brent! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

text: Closed the doors early, because the cashiers don't want to work after 6 pm . With plenty of Associates to run the cash register. But they choose the only have one register open. While I was standing here they turn back eight different groups of people .. Their excuse was there already going to be after 6 getting out of the store. Then they should have opened up the other registers. Not like they didn't have enough of people to do it. Rant over

resp.text: Thank you for providing this feedback, Nancy. We take pride in taking care of our customers and apologize for your negative experience. Marvin's leadership has been notified so they can address. Thank you again and we hope to be able to serve you in the future!

text: I enjoy shopping at Marvins.  Friendly, knowledgable staff. The store offers most things needed to get job done. They have unusual items from time to time which makes it worth while to look around.

text: Well,  when a customer ask an employee if they work here, and refuse to help that person then I don't think I will be back there any more, I think if someone comes in a store an need help with something and they can't get any help then that store is not a store I want to deal with. I look at it this I am spending money at your store I am paying your salary you need to help me, so to HELL with you and I will make sure I tell all my friends

name: Ginny Caspar
text:
UPDATE 29 May 18, Still poor customer service. No cashier at check out. Waited 5 or 6 minutes because there was no one there to ring us up. Not good business but not many other choices in Arab for certain things. :-(
UPDATE 30 April 17, Still poor customer service and they're still out of the parts we need. Made a dozen trips or more to Lowe's in the last month because they are always out. Really poor excuse for a business!!!!!!!! ABSOLUTE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!! WAITED OVER 30 MINUTES FOR HELP. I ASKED A GENTLEMAN TO SEND HELP AND THE CASHIER PAGED TWICE FOR SOMEONE TO COME HELP US. NO ONE EVER CAME. WAITED 10 MINUTES AFTER THE SECOND PAGE BEFORE WE LEFT. AT LEAST 5 OTHER FOLKS AFTER US WERE STILL WAITING FOR AS WE WERE LEAVING. WON'T BE BACK EXCEPT TO RETURN THE PIECE WE WERE TRYING TO EXCHANGE. I'LL STICK WITH LOWE'S FROM NOW ON! COULD HAVE DRIVEN THERE IN THE TIME WE WASTED WAITING HERE!!!!

Very poor customer service !
I have called the store in Arab,AL and some lady will eventually answer and ask what she can help you with....then you are put on hold and no one “ever” picks up the phone to give you an answer !!!!!!!!
Thanks Marvin’s in Arab, Alabama, “I can tell you really appreciate my business !!!”
So....needless to say I will drive the 25 minutes to
Lowe’s in Guntersville !

This is highly unusual, and we will look into this matter further. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, and we will use it to improve in the future.

If its not in stock save yourself the headache and go to another company.

text:
I loaded trees here , these guys know what they're doing! Loaded quickly, they got the trees in exactly the correct spot on the trailer.
Tarp was tight and remained that way all the way to Oklahoma City ,didn't have to touch it.
I wish all tree would be this easy.
Many thanks.

name: Frank Tipton
text: GREAT and fast service, yet load very carefully secuerly.

name: John Stevison
text: Nice trees friendly people

name: Wayne Blockel
text: Always make time for emergencies and arrive on time and are very professional.  I've used them several time for both emergency and non-emergency calls and they have been great!  Highly recommend Sprinkler Medic for all your irrigation system needs.

name: Terry Brown
text: They were quick reacting on a Saturday evening  to evaluate my leak and had it rebuilt by Sunday  morning,  830. The leak was after the main cutoff and before the sprinkler cutoff so the main would have had to be off to stop it from leaking. They also redesigned the the whole line from the main cutoff  to the sprinkler cutoff making it up to code and functionally perfect. You can barely tell they were there so clean up was excellent too. I will use them in the future.

name: Johnnie Grate
text: Sprinkler Medic came to perform irrigation winterization.  They were prompt, thorough, and courteous.  The previous irrigation company (Raintree Sprinkler Systems) was just the opposite in every way.  I highly recommend Sprinkler Medic for your irrigation needs.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We look forward to working with you in the future and greatly appreciate your business!

name: Dissatisfied Customer
text: Promptly paid for 10min service call. Representative failed  to provide a quote on ways to improve my current irrigation system. Called to follow up on the quote with no response.

name: John Jeffery
text: Josh was on time, fast and professional.  Highly recommended!!!

name: Carlos M. Fernandez
text: Awesome response time. Josh was super helpful, understanding and accommodating. Highly recommend. Thanks for your business ethics.

resp.text: Thank you Carlos! We appreciate the business and great review!

name: Chris Henke
text: I called them because my system was constantly running if the water main was open. They came out the following day and had it running properly in just a few minutes. Their price is fair, and from my experience fast service and no hassle. I will call them again for future sprinkle system needs. Highly recommend.

name: John
text: Found problems with my system. Gave me details on what repairs were required. The price was great, the work was done quickly ,yard was left clean and I would use this company again if needed.

name: Aaron Atkins
text: I had a non-functioning sprinkler system I was delaying on repair, and Chris and team had everything working in just a few hours!  I'm not sure why I even put it off...Excellent customer service, great price, very professional!  Highly recommended.

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the kind words Aaron! Glad we could get your sprinkler system sorted out and back on track.

Looking forward to working with you in the future!

name: Laura Seeber
text: Can't say enough good things about Josh and Sprinkler Medic! I had a prob with another company that hit my sprinkler system and Josh went ahead and dealt directly with them since they were the ones paying. A LOT of calls and red tape. He got my sprinkler system all fixed and as a side effect a few other sprinklers weren't working because of dirt clogs from all the work and mishaps. He came back out and fixed everything. Great job and stands by their work.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We look forward to doing business with you in the future.

name: Caren Bevill
text: Called to locate valves lost by cable contractors and Josh was quick and professional.  Would call again if I needed sprinkler related assistance.

name: jarrod lancaster
text: Josh and Chris went the extra mile to ensure a flawless repair. Highly recommend their services for anyone looking for irrigation repair or service.

resp.text: thank you jarrod, we look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Jeremy Owen
text: Great group of people, fair prices and very professional.

name: Dallas Phillips
text: This company came quickly but I made mistake of not asking for price. I figured at most it would be $100. The job was installing 1ball valve and about18 inches of pvc pipe.I already had the pipe exposed.I was charged $170. He said the rate was $85 a hour with a two hr. Minimum. At that rate this company should be rich. For 8 Hours of work that would be $680 a day. He worked about 15 minutes AND WAITED for 30 minutes for glue to set.Pretty good money for a sprinkler repairman. I don't know if doctors make that much?

resp.text: 680$- parts, insurance(we do carry it unlike others), fuel, service van (with paint still attatched), service technicians (in uniform, not a “work for beer t-shirt”)  and a guarantee that is actually worth something... ? Sounds like you got a great deal. We aren’t doctors, we are great irrigation repair technicians. Thank you for the business. We hope to serve you in the future.

name: Casey Perkins
text: I used them in the past and the quality of the work was great. They did state they would tidy up some spaghetti wires on one of the sprinkler boxes that they did not do. I am assuming because the project was more labor intensive than he had expected so cut his loss. Tried to get them to come out to give me a quote to move some sprinkler heads. The appointment got cancelled then rescheduled by them. The 2nd appointment they was a no show and did not call to reschedule. I am assuming it is a busy time and probably forgot to put it on his appointment book since it was a Saturday quote. But still I felt it should be noted and after looking at other companies this appears to be a pattern for this time of the year (April-September).

name: Sherman Ellis

I love this place!!!! Beautiful flowers and plants. They have such an amazing staff too.   The owner is super helpful and incredibly smart.  I came here multiple times for my front yard display and they helped every step of the way, from display to planting, to maintaining.

I will be a frequent buyer and visitor

Stop by today and see the variety of things they have.

text: Amazing service and such a wealth of knowledge! I came in with a ton of questions and not only did I get them answered, but left with so much information about the several herbs I bought. Great variety and such quality! So glad to have this gem in our backyard.

name: Devin
text: Jan is very informative. She is kind and passionate about horticulture. Great asset to the community. Pumpkin patch was a great experience for my family!

name: Jesus Celeste Guzman
text:
Mrs. Jan is an awesome holicuturist. She earned her degree in Auburn University!  She share her story with a passion.  She definitely loves nurturing plants and nursing each one as a baby.  She plant a large variety of herbs with the help of her loving husband.  They have a Facebook page that reflects their beautiful work and feature many activities throughout the year that include the community.  Specially the little kiddos, they have pumpkin festival, face painting, rides and horse onboarding. And the new project coming up soon.....is garden beds for little kids to learn about gardening!
Is a perfect place for family and friends to come together and explore nature, plant nursery and a large variety of plants.  Another special highlight is the fact that if you a specific herb, all you got it do is tell Mrs. Jan and she will make sure that she will grow it for you.....what? That is fantastic!
You got it make time to go mingle with them southern kind heart, down to earth, hard working peeps!
I highly recommend this garden center!
Brake the routine, explore, discover and enjoy your kiddos while they are little.  Create memories that last a lifetime and unplug from the same old stuff...
Jandarella's Garden Center is the best in town!
Don't forget to click LIKE on my review!

name: Susan Johnson
text:
Love, love, love going to Andy’s!!!  This is my Go-To place for spring flowers and my Boston fern! These plants are so well cared for; luscious foliage and continue to grow and provide beauty through Spring and Summer.  You can get Bonus Bucks during the month of March to redeem June 1st-June 10th. The employees are so knowledgeable and helpful and will help getting purchases to car!

Today I made another trip to Andy‘s and Andrew helped me choose my Boston fern for my screened porch and two dwarf globe Japanese Cedars for my front porch! Andrew is always so helpful and friendly and very knowledgeable! I love this place! 🥰

resp.text: Susan - Thank you so much for your glowing review! We always look forward to helping you with all your gardening needs!

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Andy’s is great.   It’s very organized and they have a great staff with lots of experience.   The place is laid out and merchandised well and is very nice.   Being a contractor I use them when I have jobs in Vestavia for good high quality material.

name: Barbara Zary
text: Apathetic employees. Poor customer service. Can’t be bothered to apologize or attempt to make things right.

text: Great nursery. All the plants look healthy and Jan and the gang are wonderful to deal with.

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Great nursery with a good selection of seasonal plants, planters and garden decorations.

name: Edward DeMellier
text: We almost always find the plants and landscaping materials we want. We get good advice.

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: The mums are about to pop! They have all the colors!

name: JP Cruz
text:
Great selection. Great care and service. Hearty plants, knowledgeable staff. We keep coming back year after year. Consistently hearty plants.

Compared to the big box stores, Andy's plants have had a higher rate of survivability and hardiness. Demonstrably better plants, probably because the staff is so dedicated to the care and feeding of each plant.

Great knowledge of native plant species. The only place in birmingham I can get reliable insect control species and pollinator-friendly species in the same trip. Such a great selection, my son now has his own nursery in his room and is excited to care for each plant daily. Our front and back yards are now much more our own now that we've put roots down. Thank you, Andy! Your staff rocks!

resp.text: Thanks so much for being a loyal customer! We really appreciate your repeat business!

name: Austin Reese
text: Does Andy's source their compost from a landfill? I ordered 8 yards of compost, which itself was excellent quality, but had to remove 2 full yard bins of trash. Aluminum cans, large pieces of plastic, shredded children's clothing, a loaded shotgun shell and thousands of 1-3" rocks. I expected better of Andy's as we love their nursery and farmer's market but this was disappointing.

resp.text: We hate to hear this. Our compost comes directly from the leaf debris collected and composted by the City of Mountain Brook. We will pass along this laundry list of undesirable items. If you ever have an issue with the products we sell, give us a call so we can amend the situation immediately. 824-0233. Next time you are in, let us know and we will come up with something to amend this.

text: The hours on Google state they are open at 7 am on Saturdays.  At 7:06 the lights were off and the parking lot was empty.  They've been open before at 7 am as I've been there.  Come 11 am I called and couldn't get anyone to answer a phone.   A friend of mines business had a delivery scheduled from them today as well, and nobody showed up.  I like dealing with small locally owned businesses, but the big box store got the money today simply for being open during their stated hours.  This place seems to have gone downhill since changing ownership.

resp.text: Hi Derrick, thank you for sharing your experience.  We've shared them with the senior managers to review.  If you would like someone to reach out directly, please feel free to fill out a form on our website: https://www.homehardwarecenter.com/Contact-Us

I can not understand for the life of me how they are still in business.  Must be a sham front store for something else or they have too my foolish pride to consider closing the doors even if it would be step one by any professional who reviewed their service standards for 15 seconds.   Oh and the prices are Beyond ridiculous!  Do yourself a favor and keep driving for 10 minutes until you hit home depot and lowes.  Only in this case would i recommend those big box stores over something local, but this case is far beyond extreme!

The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: David Patey
text: First review--- Excellent experience buying a new grill. I'm not sure if it's common, but I happen to check their website after seeing it in store, and it had a $100 off of the store price offer with curbside pick up... Um, sure !! Again, not sure that is common, but I will now certainly suggest it hence forth. And the curbside pick up went great as well. Welcome to Decatur, TSC.

resp.text: David, we appreciate you shopping with us. Thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Olivia Nolen
text: Love this store! The Decatur location delivers  amazing customer service and has knowledgeable, kind employees. My favorite store in town! Shout out to the store manager Jason, and Amanda for their exceptional service. Also the cashier, also named Olivia, was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Valerie Phelps
text: Website states they can refill propane tanks and they are open until 8pm. We head that way around 6pm with our tanks that need filled. Get there and the cashier says that they do not have anyone there to fill them. Why would a business advertise they can fill propane and not schedule an employee to actually fill them? There are not any specific times for filling posted on web site or in store. Every manager on duty should be qualified. Very disappointed ☹️

resp.text: We are so sorry for the inconvenience, Valerie! We will surely address this with the store management team. Our Customer Solutions team is available at 877-718-6750, should you need further assistance.

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

text: Great customer service from the manager, Jason, and the cashier, Olivia.  Both were very helpful!  Great experience!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback.

text: great selection of bird feeders and wildbird food, dog toys, food, snacks. clean inside.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Katie Morris
text: I went to get my two puppies their shots which I could buy there and do it myself but wasn’t sure bc I had never done before. But their was this sweet girl that has worked at the Vets Office for over a year and she said if I would bring my puppies she would do it for free. She gave both my puppies their shots and they didn’t cry, whine, bite or anything! And they even gave a great after! The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable about the things I needed!!!

resp.text: Katie, thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate your feedback. #LifeOutHere

name: Nicole Terry
text: Customer service was awful the last 2 times i been in there.I call and was told they had a 6 in 1 parvo shot so when I get there the cashier won’t even go look just ingore me and was so hateful.I won’t be back

resp.text: Nicole, we appreciate you shopping with us. Thank you for your feedback and we will share this with the team.

text: Love going to this store! Friendly & willingness to help esp Amanda! She was so kind & helped me with everything I needed!

resp.text: Wynn, thanks for the 5 star review! We appreciate you shopping with us.

name: Michelle
text:
Extremely RUDE employees at pick up. I refuse to use this store again. It's a shame their employees act like that at a brand new store.

Apparently, they didn't believe me that I was going to call corporate when I called and asked for a manager, the woman who answered said she was the "manager". She most certainly was not and most likely the person I had the issue with. I did, in fact, call corporate and the District Manager,  Landis, called me back within the hour. He was extremely nice and addressed the issue, but I won't be returning based on this first and last visit.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us, Michelle! We appreciate your feedback.

name: braeden Brown
text: Went to web site to see if tractor supply could refill my camper propane tank. Web site say they refill. Went to hartselle store and was told that they did not refill at their store and referred me to the decatur store. Went to decatur store and was told by the cashier that they did not have anyone certified to refill tank . Asked if manager would be able to refill and was told that the manager was not certified to refill. Good luck with your business because I will not come back

resp.text: Braeden, we saw your feedback and would like to learn more about your experience. Please call Customer Solutions at 877-718-6750.

text: Such an awesome experience! Jason helped me pick out the perfect dog food. He was incredibly knowledgable and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us, Cheyenne! #LifeOutHere

text: Nothing really different about the store in regards to service or atmosphere compared to most other stores ( :( Except Lowe's, the worst.). Visited yesterday and found that their prices are twice as much (for identical items) for A MAJORITY of items at other stores, but their prices on bigger items (mowers, safes, trailers, etc) are about the se as everywhere else. Nothing personal (because if have ppl willing to pay more, why not.), but my loyalty will remain with my current suppliers.
